title: How to Make Zucchini Pasta Alfredo (Raw Food)

steps.headline: Make the zucchini spirals.
steps.description: You will need a spiral slicer to produce the length and single size needed.

steps.headline: Peel the large zucchini.
steps.description: Then, cut off the ends and spin them individually in the slicer. As you do so, turn them into beautiful little curly ribbons of squash. If preferred, cut them down into manageable strips for easier consumption.

steps.headline: Mix the Alfredo sauce ingredients in the high speed blender.
Pour the sauce over the zucchini in a bowl.
steps.description: Garnish with fresh parsley. It's now ready to serve.

text: Make the zucchini spirals. You will need a spiral slicer to produce the length and single size needed. Peel the large zucchini. Then, cut off the ends and spin them individually in the slicer. As you do so, turn them into beautiful little curly ribbons of squash. If preferred, cut them down into manageable strips for easier consumption. Mix the Alfredo sauce ingredients in the high speed blender. Mix until smooth and creamy. Pour the sauce over the zucchini in a bowl. Garnish with fresh parsley. It's now ready to serve.
